description:
Fresh lime and a subtle heat accompany chewy rice noodles and chicken, for a Pad Thai experience that doesn’t disappoint.

  • Ingredients: rice noodle (rice flour, water), sauce (tomato powder (tomato, 1% silicon dioxide), organic cane sugar, white vinegar (maltodextrin and white distilled vinegar), savory soup base (maltodextrin, salt, autolyzed yeast extract, yeast extract, onion powder, silicon dioxide, turmeric extract (color), sunflower oil), garlic, crystallized lime (citric acid, lime oil, lime juice), cilantro, crushed red chili pepper, sea salt), peanut butter (peanuts, cane sugar, palm fruit oil (certified sustainable), salt), dry roasted peanuts, freeze-dried cooked white meat chicken, red bell pepper, sriracha powder (pure cane sugar, paprika, white vinegar (maltodextrin and white distilled vinegar), tomato powder (tomato, 1% silicon dioxide), jalapeno chili pepper, garlic, sea salt), green onion, crystallized lime (citric acid, lime oil, lime juice)
  • Allergens: contains peanuts
name: Backpacker's Pantry Pad Thai with Chicken
